remarks: An inner product is a complex number.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-May-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipcl.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
dipcl $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A P B ) e. CC ) $.
